    • Constructor Detail

      • War

        public War()
        Sets up game of War. Creates new deck and deals half to each player

    • Method Detail

      • getCard

        public void getCard()
        The getCard method draws the top card from each players hand

      • compare

        public void compare(Card object1,
                    Card object2)
        The compare method compares each players card to see which is bigger. All the cards in that rounds pile go to the player whose card is bigger
        Parameters:
        object1 - A card object to be compared
        object2 - Another card object to be compared

      • cardWar

        public void cardWar()
        The cardWar method deals one card, then another one. The last card dealt by each player is compared. If it is bigger, all the cards go to that respective players pile

      • getPlayerPile

        public void getPlayerPile()
        The getPlayer Pile refills your deck with the cards from your card pile

      • getComputerPile

        public void getComputerPile()
        The getComputerPile method refiils your opponents deck with the cards from your card pile

        public int myPile()
        The myPile() method returns the amount of cards in the players pile of cards
        Returns:
        The number of cards in the player pile
